hero.title: Georgina Tomas
hero.subtitle: Full-stack Developer
hero.description: Driven by curiosity and the desire to create useful solutions.

caseus.title: Caseus · Cheese App
caseus.description: Application for cheese lovers that facilitates the complete management of the production, maturation and tasting process, with the possibility of sharing your creations with the community.

boletus.title: Boletus App
boletus.description: Application for mushroom hunting enthusiasts that allows you to record and organize found locations to easily return, receive notifications when you are near a saved point and check the weather forecast for each area.

todo.title: Todo App
todo.description: Task management application that allows you to organize, prioritize and track your daily activities efficiently.
